pagerduty-incidents.name: pagerduty-incidents
pagerduty-incidents.description: Faker for PagerDuty - incident correlation with deployments
args: Generate PagerDuty incident API tools for correlating deployments with incidents. Include tools for: 1) Incident retrieval (list_incidents, get_incident_details, search_incidents_by_service), 2) Deployment correlation (find_incidents_after_deployment, calculate_mttr_for_release, track_incident_frequency_by_version), 3) Alert analysis (get_alert_volume, analyze_alert_patterns, identify_alert_storms), 4) On-call impact (get_escalation_count, track_pages_triggered, analyze_time_to_acknowledge), 5) Post-mortem data (get_incident_timeline, extract_root_causes, track_similar_incidents). Accept deployment_timestamp, service_name, time_window, and severity filters.
